response.original_title: Swept Away by My Janitor Husband
response.overview: In Swept Away by My Janitor Husband movie, Ethan, the CEO of Rutherford Enterprises, is undercover as a janitor to uncover a company mole. However, his secret identity complicates things when he falls for Melanie, a secretary at his company. Meanwhile, Melanie, unaware of his true identity, is dealing with betrayal from her fianc√© and best friend, as well as family pressure to prove her engagement with a successful man.
response.title: Swept Away by My Janitor Husband
